imageAssets.description: Breathtaking portal preview for 'Lost City of Eldoria'. An ancient, crumbling sandstone ruin, partially reclaimed by a lush, bioluminescent jungle under a twilight sky. A mysterious, shimmering portal or archway is central, exuding faint magical energy. Style: detailed fantasy illustration, atmospheric, sense of forgotten grandeur and hidden magic. Colors: deep greens, glowing blues, sandstone, twilight purples.
imageAssets.purpose: Preview image for the 'Lost City of Eldoria' theme selection portal. ID: eldoriaPreview

imageAssets.description: Dynamic portal preview for 'Neon Cyberpunk Rhapsody'. A rain-slicked, neon-lit alley in a futuristic megacity. Towering skyscrapers with holographic ads loom in the background. A glitchy, data-stream-like portal flickers into existence against a graffiti-covered wall. Style: detailed cyberpunk art, cinematic lighting, vibrant neons. Colors: electric blue, magenta, deep purple, reflective wet surfaces.
imageAssets.purpose: Preview image for the 'Neon Cyberpunk Rhapsody' theme selection portal. ID: cyberpunkPreview

imageAssets.description: Expansive portal preview for 'Cosmic Opera of Xylos'. A view from a spaceship cockpit or alien vista overlooking a swirling, multi-colored nebula. Crystalline alien structures or majestic, ringed planets are visible. A stable, shimmering wormhole or energy rift serves as the portal. Style: epic space opera art, vibrant cosmic colors, sense of immense scale. Colors: deep indigos, bright teals, gold, cosmic dust pinks.
imageAssets.purpose: Preview image for the 'Cosmic Opera of Xylos' theme selection portal. ID: xylosPreview

imageAssets.description: Enchanting portal preview for 'Whispers of the Feywild'. A sun-dappled clearing in an ancient, magical forest. Giant, whimsical mushrooms glow softly. Twisted, moss-covered trees have subtle faces. The portal is a natural archway formed by intertwined, glowing vines and flowers, with shimmering light within. Style: enchanting fantasy illustration, whimsical, detailed, magical realism. Colors: emerald greens, earthy browns, pastel glows from flora, golden sunlight.
imageAssets.purpose: Preview image for the 'Whispers of the Feywild' theme selection portal. ID: feywildPreview
